title: Data Science Project – Student Performance Analysis with Machine Learning
description: It takes a lot of manual effort to complete the evaluation process as even one college may contain thousands of students. In this Data Science Project we will evaluate the Performance of a student using Machine Learning techniques and python.You can download the data set you need for this project from here:Let’s start with importing the libraries :To read the data set :#Output- (1000, 8)To look at the first 5 records in the data setLets check the no. of unique items present in the categorical columnlets check the percentage of missing data in each columns present in the data :To see comparison of all other attributes with respect to Math MarksComparison of all other attributes with respect to Reading Marks :Lets check the Effect of Lunch on Student’s PerformnceLets check the Effect of Test Preparation Course on Scores
